all_text_content:
Verse of the Day
Wherefore, verily I say unto you that all things unto me are spiritual, and not at any time have I given unto you a law which was temporal; neither any man, nor the children of men; neither Adam, your father, whom I created.
Doctrine and Covenants 29:34
Quote of the Day
"Avoiding the blessing and responsibility of child-rearing solely for the sake of career advancement can convert laudable achievement into a form of rebellion."
D. Todd Christofferson | 1 Oct 2024General Conference
